item.description:
Let's try India Restaurant in Providence as the site for the next Rhode Island Atheist Society Happy Hour(s)! The atmosphere of the restaurant is terrific and the appetizers for Happy Hour start at $1.00 and up (with a $5.00 drink purchase) and the menu looks pretty yummy - with lots of vegetarian or vegan options: http://www.indiaresta...

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the bar area of the restaurant.
item.name: Rhode Island Atheist Society Happy Hour(s) - India Restaurant in Providence
